title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

title: Cult killer
description: When a renowned private investigator is murdered, his protege takes on the case. As her investigation unfolds, she is forced into a dangerous alliance with his killer to uncover the town's grisly secrets and bring justice to its victims.

title: Fighter
description: Top IAF aviators come together in the face of imminent danger, to form Air Dragons. FIGHTER unfolds their camaraderie, brotherhood and battles, internal and external.

title: Teacher's Pet
description: When a dog wants to be a boy after watching pinocchio, he meets a mad scientist who steals his mind, now his owner, a lizard, and a parrot have to go into the timeliness to give him pizza and save him.

title: Miller's Girl
description: A creative writing assignment yields complex results between a teacher and his talented student..

title: Sometimes I Think About Dying
description: Fran, who likes to think about dying, makes the new guy at work laugh, which leads to dating and more. Now the only thing standing in their way is Fran herself.

title: American Star
description: An assassin on a final assignment in Fuerteventura, to kill a man he has never met. When his target is delayed, he finds himself drawn to the island, people and a ghostly shipwreck.

title: The Epidemic
description: Group of people find themselves trapped in States from Zombies.

title: The Promised Land
description: The story of Ludvig Kahlen who pursued his lifelong dream: To make the heath bring him wealth and honor.

title: Disco Boy
description: ter a painful journey through Europe, Aleksei arrives in Paris to join the Foreign Legion. In the Niger Delta, Jomo struggles against the oil companies threatening his village and the lives of his family.

title: Jungle Bunch: Operation Meltdown
description: When a mysterious toxic foam starts spreading in the jungle, there's only one team brave enough to stop it. The Jungle Bunch. With no time to spare, it's time to start sailing boats on their journey across the world to find the antidote.

title: The Private Eye
description: The life of private eye, Mort Madison, is spiraling downward, when a beguiling, slightly familiar woman hires him for his most unusual case.

title: Perfect Days
description: A janitor in Japan drives between jobs listening to rock music.
